name: Little Red Riding Hood Free
description:
Run over the river and through the woods, to grandmother’s house we go! Little Red Riding Hood is an interactive and immersive app that brings to life the fairytale’s classic illustrations with the magic of modern technology. Enjoy Little Red Riding Hood and read it with your family as you would a moving picture book! It’s truly an engaging experience!

Interactive Features:
~ Touch and interact with the storybook images... watch them fall, bounce and collide.
~ Multiple interactions for every animation — can you find them all?
~ Enjoy and move the vintage illustrations. Make the original book come to life!

Gravity Enabled Images
~ Move them, swing them, clink them!
~ Many drawings in this app have layers — what moves? What requires you to make it move? Exploration is part of the fun in reading!

Read to Me!
~ Read to yourself or listen to the story by clicking the narration button on every page.
~ Great for kids and adults who enjoy reading with family and being read to! Take your time with each scene and enjoy!
~ The narration option is great for parents who want to take a break from all the reading. Share the story together!

Explore!
~ Each and every page has immersive, interactive content. We created a completely interactive experience with the drawings, bringing the original story to life. Try touching everything you see on the screen!
~ Also, many of the scenes have hidden objects that move as you move the device!

Vintage Animations
~ At Fairytale Studios, we take original stories and remaster them in the spirit of how it was intended to be experienced years ago.
~ The original animations from the 1800's have been redrawn and professionally enhanced for your iOS device.
~ Enjoy the hand-drawn work and interact with the originals on your device!

All Ages
~ Designed for ages three and up, but can be enjoyed by anyone young at heart.

Universally Compatible
~ Have an iPhone 5, iPhone 4, 3GS, iPad Mini and an iPad? No problem! The app is designed to be played on every unique iOS device with no additional purchase needed.

Privacy Protection
We take online safety for children as a top priority and ensure that this app contains No social network integration, and No purchases required to continue playing. The app contains a "More Apps" section, with links to the App Store of our other titles. To make the app free for all users we have included ads by reputable agencies with no malicious content, we want the user to have the choice to have a free app with the option to remove all ads. We strongly encourage all users to take the option of ad removal so that the reading experience is as simple as reading a book off your very own bookshelf. We want to be very clear and have the option be in your hands!
